function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive correlation between compliance and perceived threat, specific moral alignment, negative emotions, and other factors.","Impact":"Higher risk of non-compliance if these factors are not addressed.","Mitigation":"Address factors influencing compliance through targeted interventions and communication strategies.","Technologies":"Behavioral tracking and analysis, targeted messaging and communication tools.","People":"General public, individuals in a community or organization.","Owner":"Local health authorities, community organizations, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Negative correlation between compliance and opportunity to violate, impulsivity, and non-normative OOL.","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance in the presence of these factors.","Mitigation":"Develop strategies to reduce opportunities for violations, address impulsivity, and promote normative behavior.","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, behavior modification tools, community engagement platforms.","People":"General public, individuals in a community or organization.","Owner":"Local health authorities, community organizations, public health agencies."}]}
